name: test_e2e_with_logs[771_HHI_XFH_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `HHI_XFH_002` |
| **Name** | X-Forwarded-Host password reset |
| **Category** | HOST_HEADER |
| **Subcategory** | open_redirect |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `X-Forwarded-Host: evil.com/reset`
- **Encoded**: `X-Forwarded-Host%3A%20evil.com%2Freset`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~23000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:11:59.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|

| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX Host Header] Host header injection attempt detected test_id=HHI_XFH_002-1772266319127-2c8abeo pattern_id=HHI_XFH_002 uri=/?q=X-Forwarded-Host%3A%20evil.com%2Freset client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
